summary: 1999  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The Memorial Day Miracle is a game-winning three-point field goal by Sean Elliott in Game 2 of the 1999 Western Conference Finals between the Portland Trail Blazers and San Antonio Spurs at the Alamodome in San Antonio, Texas on May 31, 1999, Memorial Day.
title: Memorial Day Miracle
